Title: Colony (1)
Plot: After the obituaries of four identical men are e-mailed to Mulder, the agents are contacted by a shadowy CIA agent who tells them about a bounty hunter sent to wipe out the beginning of a colony of clones. Meanwhile Mulder is distracted by the sudden reappearance of his sister Samantha.
GuestStars: Brian Thompson, David L. Gordon, Andrew Johnston, Tim Henry, Michael McDonald, Capper McIntyre, Bonnie Hay, James Leard, Linden Banks, Kim Restell, Richard Sargent, Ken Roberts, Michael Rogers, Oliver Becker, Dana
